function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of services to the new normal","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey participants potentially being unaware of their covid-19 status and spreading the virus during in-person interactions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zoonotic infections from wild animals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misallocation of resources in coronavirus response, diverting attention from other contagious diseases like influenza.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of direct medical evidence to conclude the effectiveness of gated communities in reducing covid-19 risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly contagious coronavirus sars-cov-2 causing covid-19 poses a significant risk of transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large number of participants from all indonesian regions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large financial aid packages may encourage increased public spending and economic activity, potentially leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in the community.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of occupant-centric building operation modules","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of population density","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact of harsh restrictions on the economy and people’s lives","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of workers to implement lockdown policy due to home quarantine","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and data security","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to differentiate between air loss to outdoors and to adjacent apartments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influenza virus survival prediction may be inaccurate due to different models and variable parameters.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disturbance of air and dispersal of airborne aerosols due to movement of people within enclosed spaces.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of preventive measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of dynamic modeling and population-based kalman filter approach introduces a risk of model complexity and interpretation challenges.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on early adoption of ai and cognitive tools","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seasonal variation in airborne infection risk due to changes in outdoor air supply","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission among colleagues","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare systems during pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced capacity and increased costs of implementing safety procedures may lead to inadequate conservation activities.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete information in the medical and health kgs may lead to misinformed treatment decisions for covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequalities exacerbating the disease burden for vulnerable populations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contaminated surfaces leading to virus transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing mobile application in a smaller clinic may result in potential exposure to contagious diseases for the operators and patients.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of responsible economic operators and nations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial anxiety leading to homeowners avoiding selling their homes due to uncertainties caused by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health sector overwhelmed","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unreliable self-reported symptom onset for covid-19 infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for green space quality in study design","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of collective action to combat covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctant information disclosure leading to public’s ignorance of self-protection","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Chronic under-funding of the world health organization who leading to limited resources for global health governance.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Live video conferencing for healthcare professionals and patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in the application of sick leave policies for construction workers, especially those paid on a daily basis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment due to close proximity and association among stakeholders.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New expectations regarding social distancing within green spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of spss 25.0 for data analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unregulated use of cash payments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socialising in residential spaces may expose occupants to risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient cleaning and sterilization of equipment and machines increases the risk of disease transmission among gym members.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Random sampling selection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective tracking of geographical spread of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"And capacity","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about specific roles and responsibilities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks associated with high co2 concentration in indoor air","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
